FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the instance of the observation. Displayed at the top of each page.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the observation. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance were last modified.

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The start time for the observation activity. Displayed to students.

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The end time for the observation activity. Displayed to students.

TABLE.NAME: observation_timeslots
TABLE.COMMENT: Details about specific timeslots students can sign up to for an observation activity.

KEY.NAME: observation
KEY.COMMENT: The particular instance of the mod_observation this timeslot is linked to.
